category: National Pension Review Committee Operation Regulations/Article 13 (Payment of review allowance, etc.)
contents: Article 13 (Payment of review allowance, etc.) ① Review allowances may be paid within the budget to members (excluding members who are executives and employees of the Corporation) who attend the meeting of the Review Committee and deliberate on the agenda or deliberate in writing. Revised on April 22, 2014. ② Appraisers pursuant to the provisions of Article 97 of the Decree may be paid the costs of appraisal within the budget.
